K10tbimbk_u:5: saparivāra bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya śirasā praṇamya bhagavato 'ntikaṃ niṣaṇṇa dharmaśravaṇārtham* atha (Tbks 2r3)
K10tbimbk_u:6: bhagavāṃ sarvasatvānusaṃśayaṃ jñātvā tebhyo mahājanakāyebhya dharmaśrāvaṇikebhyaḥ tasya suvarṇaprabhasya rājakumārasya pūrvasucaritapuṇyaphalena (Tbks 2r4)
K10tbimbk_u:9: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyaṃjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇam* (Tbks 2r6)
K10tbimbk_u:12: vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannas sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiś śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ (Tbks 2v1)
K10tbimbk_u:13: buddho bhagavāṃ buddhakṛtyam a..aśiṣyavineyakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā nirindhano 'gnir iva parinirvṛta samabhijagāma :
K10tbimbk_u:15: bhikṣavaḥ paruṣadaridrakṛṣikarmaṇāvaprativṛtti bhagavatā vipaśyina śāsanebhiḥ prasannāḥ bhagavato vipaśyinaḥ (Tbks 2v3)
K10tbimbk_u:17: tasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ samaye sa evāyaṃ suvarṇaprabho rājakumāra yad bhagavato vipaśyinaḥ pratimāṃ (Tbks 2v4)
K10tbimbk_u:18: kārayata yat puṇyaphalasamudayaprabhāvai divyasukhopabhogaiśvaryamahātvam anubhūtavān* ayaṃ sa suvarṇaprabho (Tbks 2rv5)
K10tbimbk_u:19: rājakumāra samāsato bhikṣava sarvāsu jātiṣu tad bhāṣayāmi:
K10tbimbk_u:27: (Tbks 3r2) sa kāmāvacareṣu devanikāyeṣu svargeṣu ekaikaśaḥ śatasahasrakṛtvā bhikṣava devānām indro rājā babhūva : (Tbks 3r2)
K10tbimbk_u:28: evaṃvidha : śatasahasrakṛtvā daśa brahmakāyikeṣu brahmādhipatir babhūvu:
K10tbimbk_u:35: (Tbks 3r6) suvarṇaprabho rājakumāraḥ antike devamanuṣyāṇāṃ acyutaṃ ajaraṃ amaraṇaṃ śivaṃ śāntaṃ padaṃ labhiṣyatīti /
K10tbimbk_u:36: tato (Tbks 3r7) 'sya bhikṣava suvarṇaprabhasya rājakumārasya buddhapratimāpuṇyaphalaprabhāvam anuśṛṇutā mānuṣyajātiṣu yeṣu (Tbks 3v1)
K10tbimbk_u:57: snāpayitvā pūjayitvā yasya kasyacid bhikṣavaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā buddhapratimāpuṇyaphalaniṣyanda : (Tbks 3v6)
K10tbimbk_u:62: yaḥ kaścid bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā /
K10tbimbk_u:78: kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāṇaṃ śāntam adhigacchatīti vadāmi bhikṣavaḥ (Tbks 4r5)
K10tbimbk_u:81: parinirvṛto 'pi adhigato nāpi buddho bhagavāṃ parinirvṛta iva buddhapratimāyā darśanād iti vadāmi bhikṣava idam avocad bhagavāṃ (Tbks 4r7)
K10tbimbk_u:83: kṛtvā purā kāśyapabiṃbam agryaṃ gandhodakai snāpitavāṃ dvijendraḥ /
K10tbimbk_u:84: (Tbks 4v1) puṣpai sugandhais sumanojñagandhai tenaiva puṇyena bhavād vimuktaḥ 1
K10tbimbk_u:85: yaṃ nirmalaḥ kleśamalair vimukta cittasya citteśvaratāgatiṃ syaḥ
K10tbimbk_u:86: rūpaṃ na tṛptāś ca nirīkṣya matvā tadbiṃba saṃsnāpayato jinasya 2 (Tbks 4v2)
K10tbimbk_u:88: labhanti nāryaḥ puruṣāś ca loke tadbiṃba saṃsnāpayato jinasya 3 (Tbks 4v3)
K10tbimbk_u:90: śāntaṃ padaṃ yānti narā striyo vā tadbiṃba saṃsnāpayato jinasya 4 (Tbks 4v4)
K10tbimbk_u:91: tyaktvā kaḍevaram ihaiva narā striyo vā
K10tbimbk_u:94: viśvasya tat phalam udāram uvāca buddhaḥ 5
K10tbimbk_u:99: yāvantaḥ paramāṇavo bhagavata stūpeṣu biṃbasya vā / (Tbks 4v7)
K10tbimbk_u:100: tat kartum* divi bhūtale ca niyataṃ tāvanti rājyāni te /
K10tbimbk_u:101: buddhānāṃ khalu dhātave bhagavatā śarīrā ni ca nirmitā / (Tbks 5r1)
K10tbimbk_u:104: ye martyāḥ kārayitvā pramuditamanasā pūjayante yathāvat (Tbks 5r2)
K10tbimbk_u:105: svarge saktye ca rūpaṃ nayanaratikaraṃ śuddhacāmīkarābham*
K10tbimbk_u:106: te labdhāś śāntikāmā sukham idam atulaṃ prāpnuvanty āvajuṣṭaṃ // 8 (Tbks 5r3)
K10tbimbk_u:107: ity evādiprakārāṃ suvarṇaprabhavasuyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā paṃcaśatasahasra (Tbks 5r4)
K10tbimbk_u:109: sarvaṃ gārhasthyam apahāya tathaiva śāsane pravrajita
K10tbimbk_u:110: yoniśa sa manaskāraṃ kṛtvā sarvakleśaprahāṇā arhatvaṃ strīparivārās (Tbks 5r6)
K10tbimbk_u:111: samaloṣṭakāṃcana samacittāḥ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyā apahṛtabhārāḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojana vimuktās saṃsārabandhanās (Tbks 5r7)
K10tbimbk_u:114: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandam* bhikṣavaś caturdiśasaṃkhyārhatvaṃ babhūvu /
